title: How to make pizza
description: Making your own dough turns a pizza into a really special meal. The great thing about this dough is that it can be made in advance, and even frozen. If cooking on a budget try cheap toppings such as mushrooms, tinned sweetcorn, salami and here's a secret; cheaper mozzarella is actually the best for pizza.
ingredients: 15g/½oz fresh yeast, or 1½ tsp of dry yeast
50ml/2fl oz olive oil, plus extra for oiling
